unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Statistical Test for Advertiser
question_text:
An advertiser for a company wanted to get some research done so she could show that her company's large chain of banks were doing well. She decided to randomly select $30$ of the banks across the country and see how many customers were coming to the bank on average each day over the past week. She is hoping to show that this number is greater than $100$ customers per day.
Which of the following statistical tests would be most appropriate here?

choices.text: Confidence interval for the difference of two sample means
